name: 統計方法（一）
description:
1. Fundamental of statistics: 
  Random variables, Probability mass (density) function, Cumulative distribution function
  Mean and variance, Central limit theorem
  Simulation

2. Exploratory data analysis: 
  Measurement scales, data types, univariate data, bivariate data,multivariate data.
  ggplot2 in R
  
3. Statistical decision making: Point estimate, Confidence interval hypothesis testing 
  Hypothesis testing for continuous random variable, 
  Hypothesis testing for categorical data, 
  Nonparametric statistical methods:
  Computational methods: permutation test, bootstrap
  Power and sample size
  
4. Regression analysis
  Simple and multiple linear regressions for continuous data,matrix notation
  Interpretation and estimation of regression coefficients
  Confounding and interaction
  Regression diagnostics
  Generalised least squares (GLS)
  lowess and bootstrap


5. Analysis of Variance 
  Factors and contrasts.
  Multistratum experiments and random effects models.
  Expected mean squares for the split plot experiment.  
  Least squares estimates for balanced factorial experiments. Averaging operators.
  Analysis of Covariance
  Repeated measures ANOVA

7. Time series data
goals: 引導學生接觸並學習基本統計基本原理、資料探索方法(exploratory data analysis)、統計檢定(statistical hypothesis testing)相關的概念和方法、迴歸分析(regression analysis)、變異數分析（Analysis of Variance)、與時間序列分析(time series)等統計相關的概念和方法。
syllabus:
本課程將以實際的資料分析，引導學生接觸並學習基本統計基本原理、資料探索方法(exploratory data analysis)、統計檢定(statistical hypothesis testing)相關的概念和方法、迴歸分析(regression analysis)、變異數分析（Analysis of Variance)、與時間序列分析(time series)等統計相關的概念和方法。本課程將實際操作統計軟體R，進而將統計分法運用在實際資料分析上。

  
1\. Fundamental of statistics:   
  Random variables, Probability mass (density) function, Cumulative distribution function  
  Mean and variance, Central limit theorem  
  Simulation

2\. Exploratory data analysis:   
  Measurement scales, data types, univariate data, bivariate data,multivariate data.  
  ggplot2 in R  
    
3\. Statistical decision making: Point estimate, Confidence interval hypothesis testing   
  Hypothesis testing for continuous random variable,   
  Hypothesis testing for categorical data,   
  Nonparametric statistical methods:  
  Computational methods: permutation test, bootstrap  
  Power and sample size  
    
4\. Regression analysis  
  Simple and multiple linear regressions for continuous data,matrix notation  
  Interpretation and estimation of regression coefficients  
  Confounding and interaction  
  Regression diagnostics  
  Generalised least squares (GLS)  
  lowess and bootstrap

  
5\. Analysis of Variance   
  Factors and contrasts.  
  Multistratum experiments and random effects models.  
  Expected mean squares for the split plot experiment.    
  Least squares estimates for balanced factorial experiments. Averaging operators.  
  Analysis of Covariance  
  Repeated measures ANOVA

7\. Time series data

  
課程實作計劃

修課學生須完成一份資料分析的計劃。其目的在訓練學生運用課堂上所學的方法與技術，從問題形成、資料來源確認、資料搜集與整理、模型建立與分析、結果呈現、說明與視覺化，實作整個數據分析計畫。建議根據臺北捷運旅運量統計資料，配合中央氣象局臺北氣象站雨量與氣溫資料、人事行政局行事曆、以及臺北市政府民政局的北市行政區人口結構資料，自擬一個研究主題，發揮創意進行分析，發掘有價值的資訊。 https://www.cw.com.tw/article/article.action?id=5073543
